title: Fix hero typography animation and update Core Team founder profile

requirements.summary: Fix the typography animation on the hero section description text to ensure the fade-in and slide-up animation plays correctly on page load
acceptanceCriteria: The hero section description text displays a smooth fade-in and slide-up animation when the page loads
The animation plays once on initial page load
The animation timing and easing create a polished, professional effect

file_operations.description: Review the current implementation of the hero description text animation and fix the fade-in and slide-up animation to ensure it triggers correctly on page load. Add or update animation classes using Tailwind's animate utilities (animate-fade-in or similar) and ensure proper animation delay/duration settings. The description text 'Premium Millet Based products crafted with love and care by women, for a healthier you and a sustainable future.' should have smooth fade-in and slide-up effects that play once on initial render.

Review and ensure the custom animation definitions for fade-in and slide-up effects are properly configured. Verify that keyframes and animation utilities referenced in Hero.tsx are defined with appropriate timing functions and durations for a polished, professional effect.

requirements.summary: Replace the founder profile image in the Core Team section with the uploaded barnali.jpeg image
acceptanceCriteria: The founder profile displays the barnali.jpeg image
The image dimensions match the other team member profile images
The image displays clearly without distortion or quality loss

file_operations.description: Add the generated founder profile image barnali-founder.dim_400x400.png to the assets directory. This image will be used to replace the existing founder profile image in the Core Team section, matching the 400x400 dimensions of other team member images.

Update the founder team member profile to use the new image at frontend/public/assets/generated/barnali-founder.dim_400x400.png. Ensure the image source path is correctly referenced and that the image dimensions and styling match the other team member profiles (400x400 size). Verify the image displays without distortion or quality loss.

acceptanceCriteria: The founder profile displays 'Barnali Chakraborty' as the name
The name formatting and styling matches other team member names

file_operations.description: Update the founder team member profile name from 'Riya Sharma' to 'Barnali Chakraborty'. Ensure the name formatting and styling matches the other team member names in the section.

The description text remains coherent and grammatically correct
